annotation.message: An operand identifier [reference] is hiding another identifier of the same name.

a:s.a:s:
/* * Many indicator specifications in ANC and Immunization have context as patient. * I believe these should be unfiltered to get all observations not just those related to a current patient * Should discuss. */
define "Measure Population":
//On ART for at least one day in measurement period
/* * As defined by Member States */ define "Initial Population": true

/* * NOTE: Modeled as a Continuous Variable measure because this is an estimated denominator proportion measure */
define function "Measure Observation"(Patient "Patient"):
